chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald J. West was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
No contact with C.M.W. and her family.
Absolute sobriety.
No prescription drugs w/o a valid prescription.

DNA sample
Assessment, counseling, and treatment deemed appropriate by agent.

records.addlTxt: of Sentencing After Revocation Hearing and Sentencing Hearing on 7/29/2014 - includes 14CF22 & 11CF188
SEALED
SEALED

Clerk Shirley
Case called: 9:37
Includes: 11CF188 and 14CF22
State appears by ADA Theresa Wetzsteon, Defendant appears in custody with Atty John Bliss
PSI has been received by parties and the Court. SAR matter was originally in Br 3 and Atty Bliss states that they are willing to continue with both cases in Branch 1.  Corrections are that the age of the defendant is 17 and not 7 as stated in the PSI and also DNA sample and register as a sex offender is mandatory. Court makes corrections.
Arguments.
Defendant makes statement.
Court reads sentence and finds:
11CF188>>Count 1>>2 years Prison broke down as: 1 year IC and 1 year ES.
Concurrent to all other and Credit for 360 days.
Count 3>>9 months MCJ 
Concurrent to all other and Credit for 9 months.
Count 5>>9 months MCJ
Concurrent to all other and Credit for 9 month.
14CF22>>Count 1>>20 years Prison broke down as: 15 years IC and 5 years ES.
Has credit for 270 days. Court adopts the ES plan as stated in the PSI which includes: DNA sample, assessment/counseling/treatment deemed appropriate by agent, no contact with CMW and her family, restitution and CC's, absolute sobriety, no prescriptions w/o a valid prescription, FTE/School. Not eligible for programming
All sentences are concurrent to each other.

of Preliminary Examination
Sentencing hearing on July 29, 2014 at 09:30 am.
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

PLEA: Count 1>>1st Degree Sexual Assault of a child not yet 13 years>>Guilty

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
Sentencing will be argued-will need 1 1/2 hours set aside.

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim(s):  C.M.W.; no children under 18 years of age.    Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
